verses.text: Blessed is **everyone** that feareth the **Lord,** that walketh in his ways.
For thou shalt eat the **labor** of thine **hands;** happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine **houseâ€”thy** children like olive plants round about thy table.
**Behold** that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the **Lord.**
The **Lord** shall bless thee out of **Zion;** and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
Yea, thou shalt see thy children's **children** and peace upon Israel.
